db_server.DbConnection

Class dbImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • db_server.DbConnection.dbImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, rmi_int_appserver_db

    public class dbImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements rmi_int_appserver_db, java.io.Serializable
    Bevat alle methodes die de applicatieserver op de databankserver kan oproepen.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
